name: siphon-circuits
description: ZK circuits for Siphon privacy vault

scripts.contribute: snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot14_0000.ptau pot14_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -v
scripts.phase2: snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot14_0001.ptau pot14_final.ptau -v
scripts.generate-keys: snarkjs groth16 setup circuits/withdraw.r1cs pot14_final.ptau withdraw_0000.zkey
scripts.contribute-keys: snarkjs zkey contribute withdraw_0000.zkey withdraw_0001.zkey --name="Second contribution" -v
scripts.export-verifier: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey withdraw_0001.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.export-solidity: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier withdraw_0001.zkey verifier.sol
scripts.generate-proof: snarkjs groth16 prove withdraw_0001.zkey witness.wtns proof.json public.json
scripts.verify-proof: snarkjs groth16 verify verification_key.json public.json proof.json
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run generate-keys && npm run export-solidity

author: Siphon Team
